entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:57 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 08:49 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Rain over eastern sections late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
